UTILITY

ELEVATE EVERY MOMENT

The Mazda CX-90 is built for you, your passengers, and your journeys—bringing design and capability together seamlessly.

1/3

Comfortable Seats

From available perforated leather
and premium stitching to
sophisticated color palettes, our
supportive seats are designed to
enhance your drive.

Aero Gray Color

The graceful powerful form of this
vehicle is accentuated by the new
Aero Gray exterior color, available
for the CX-30.

Available Turbo Model

CX-30 2.5 Turbo models feature eye-catching accents
including a Black accented grille and durable Black
roof rails for more cargo carrying options.

DESIGN

HARMONY IN EVERY DETAIL

Crafted details and available Nappa leather-trimmed seats create a harmonious space that is both inviting and restorative.

UP TO 8-PASSENGER CAPACITY

The CX-90 comes with a 3-seat 3rd row on select models, making each passenger feel comfortable.

Available in 6-, 7- and 8-passenger configurations. Seating for 6 shown.

Multiple Power Outlets

Stay fully charged with access to 12V of accessory power and conveniently placed
available USB-C outlets.

Available Panoramic Moonroof

Driver and passengers can embrace natural light, open ambience, and the world
around them.

SAFETY

DRIVE WITH A SENSE OF SECURITY

With the i-Activsense ® suite of safety features, sophisticated safety innovations alert you to hazards to help
you avoid collisions or lessen their impact.7

2024 IIHS TOP SAFETY PICK+

We’re proud to announce that the 2024 Mazda

CX-90 has earned an IIHS TOP SAFETY PICK+

award—so you can drive with control, safety,

and confidence.

National Highway Traffic
Safety Administration

5-Star Overall Safety Rating 8 for the 2024

Mazda CX-90

STAY FOCUSED WITH i-ACTIVSENSE ® SAFETY TECHNOLOGY

1/9

Smart Brake Support - front Crossing

This available feature can pivot the headlights in the direction the steering wheel is being
turned, increasing the range of the headlights, improving visibility and making it easier to
spot potential hazards.. 12

PERFORMANCE

CRAFTED TO BE DYNAMIC

The CX-90 features a rear-biased i-Activ AWD ® that responds to changing conditions and delivers power to
the right wheels at the right time to give you responsive performance. 18

M Hybrid Boost

M Hybrid Boost improves your driving performance and fuel
economy, using a small electric motor to assist the engine in low load
driving situations. The motor is battery powered which seamlessly
uses regenerative braking to recharge.

Flexible Mi-Drive Technology

With Mi-Drive, drivers can switch between four distinct modes
designed to optimize power delivery and responsiveness: Normal,
Sport, Off-road and available Towing.

Kinematic Posture Control

Kinematic Posture Control (KPC) helps minimize vehicle body roll
while enhancing cornering. The result is improved steering feel
without sacrificing comfort.

TOWING CAPACITY

When properly equipped, the Mazda CX-90 has a 5,000-lb towing
capacity. 19 Available Towing mode also helps with vehicle stability
when driving with the extra weight, allowing you to bring along a
boat or recreation trailer without sacrificing your connection to the
road.

LEARN MORE
TECHNOLOGY

INNOVATIVE DETAILS

Available technology features like a 360° view monitor and Active Driving Display help you connect to your vehicle and to the
world around you.

360° View Monitor With See-Through View

The available 360° View Monitor with See-through View gives you an enhanced
view of the area directly ahead of and beside your vehicle that would normally be
obstructed, visible on the center display. 20

Active Driving Display

Remotely start your The available Active Driving Display has an increased display area for optimal
visibility and functionality, providing easier access to essential information about
your vehicle.


Simulated screen shown

MAZDA CONNECTED SERVICES

Locate your vehicle, start the engine, lock and unlock the doors—
all remotely. With the MyMazda App and Mazda Connected
Services, complimentary for one year on your mobile device, you
can do all this and more. 21

INTERESTED IN A HYBRID CX-50?

A new, hybrid version built with your adventures in mind will be available
soon. Offering up to 219 hp total and up to an EPA-estimated 38 combined
city/highway mpg,6 the Mazda CX-50 Hybrid will feature a new on-
demand e-AWD system and three different trim levels.
